iati-activity.title: AO-Water Sector Institutional Dvlp
iati-activity.description: The development objective of the Water Sector Institutional Development Project and its Additional financing for Angola is to strengthen the institutional capacity and efficiency of Recipient's agencies in the water sector to improve access to water supply. The restructuring will extend the closing date for the project from June 30, 2016 to June 30, 2019 to seek approval for the change in scope of project components and costs, and thus the project results framework, the disbursement estimates, and the implementation schedule to improve access to water service delivery.

contact-info.mailing-address: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

iati-activity.sector: Water sector policy and administrative management
Water supply and sanitation - large systems
Urban services and housing for the poor
